law.catch_line: Notwithstanding any other law, at a hearing relating to bail or sentencing arising out of a violatio...
law.text:
Notwithstanding any other law, at a hearing relating to bail or sentencing arising out of a violation or alleged violation of this title, hearsay evidence is admissible if:
the hearsay is relevant to the issue; and
the underlying circumstances on which the hearsay is based and the reliability of the source of the information are demonstrated.
